Sentencas: In this study, with the aim to enhance the ionic conduction of known structures by defect chemistry, the La2O3-Ta2O5 system was considered with a focus on the La3TaO7 phase whose structure is of Weberite type.
Titulo: La3TaO7 derivatives with Weberite structure type: Possible electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells and high temperature electrolysers

Sentencas: In order to predict possible preferential substitution sites and substitution elements, atomistic simulation was used as a first approach.
Titulo: La3TaO7 derivatives with Weberite structure type: Possible electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells and high temperature electrolysers

Sentencas: A solid solution La3-xSrxTaO7-x/2 was confirmed by X-ray diffraction and Raman spectroscopy; it extends for a substitution ratio up to x = 0.15.
Titulo: La3TaO7 derivatives with Weberite structure type: Possible electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells and high temperature electrolysers

Sentencas: Whereas La3TaO7 is a poor oxide ion conductor (sigma(700 degrees C) = 2 x 10(-5)S.cm(-1)), at 700 degrees C, its ionic conductivity is increased by more than one order of magnitude when 3.3% molar strontium is introduced in the structure (sigma(700 degrees C) = 2 x 10(-4)S.cm(-1)).
Titulo: La3TaO7 derivatives with Weberite structure type: Possible electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells and high temperature electrolysers
